title: iTouchMyHead : Aural Arousal
extended_details: The goal is to create a set of headphones that come with a touchscreen attached to the right headphone that gives control over stopping, starting, and volume. Additionally, users may swipe through their music selection to select the next piece to play. The use case is for quick access to control over your music playing without having to pull out your phone.
